parameters.name: LocalDBInstanceId
parameters.description: Instance ID of the data being used (required).

parameters.name: LocalDatabase
parameters.description: Database name of the data being used (required)

parameters.name: ManagerUserName
parameters.description: Management account of the data-using instance.

parameters.name: ManagerUserPassword
parameters.description: Password of the management account of the data-using instance.

parameters.name: UserName
parameters.description: Account name of the data-providing instance used for user mapping (required).

parameters.name: UserPassword
parameters.description: Password of the data-providing instance account used for user mapping.
